sub_topic: Determining the diameter of a graph.
message_1:
What is the diameter of a complete graph K8?

(Note: A complete graph K8 is a graph with 8 vertices, where each vertex is connected to every other vertex.)
message_2:
The diameter of a graph is the longest shortest path between any two vertices in the graph. In a complete graph, every vertex is connected to every other vertex directly by an edge. Therefore, the shortest path between any two vertices in a complete graph is always 1.

So, the diameter of a complete graph K8 is 1.
